about_the_game:
What’s the best music for a dungeon full of blood-sucking fiends? If your answer is rock and metal, then the Sacrifice of Vampire pack is the pack for you! ayato sound create’s latest music pack contains 23 BGM tracks filled with powerful guitars, drums, and pianos to get your players’ hearts racing and put them in the right mood for battling dangerous demons. Send your hero spiraling alongside a racing piano when they find out about the secret to their lineage, have them explore an evil underworld to heavy metal guitars, and keep your players’ blood pumping in combat with exciting guitar riffs and heavy drum beats!

Of course, not every second in your game will be high-energy and require powerful guitars and drums, which is why this pack also contains some slower tracks for those moments. Piano paired with slow electronic beats is perfect for when your main hero finds herself abandoned by her companions after a fight, or when she arrives in a town long forgotten. And when she is reunited with her friends, surging strings or choral cries could help set the scene before they finally face the final vampire lord.

Each BGM comes in a number of file formats, including m4a, mp3, wav, and looping ogg, so you can easily slide these tracks right into your current project! Fill your supernatural mansion with the sounds of organs and drums, and turn the battle against Dracula into an epic rock concert with the Sacrifice of Vampire!

Features:

* 23 royalty free songs
* ogg, mp3, m4a, wav and looping ogg files included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
